# Event
American Academy of Dermatology Annual Meeting "What's New in the Management of Advanced Skin Cancer" Session

# Overview & Learning Objectives
- Review the work up for operable NMSC
  - Discuss the utility of SLNBx & imaging in CSCC
  - Discuss the role of GEP in CSCC
- Review the management of operable NMSC 
  - Discuss the role of CPEMA and adjuvant therapy 
  - Discuss the role of pre-operative systemic therapy for NMSC
